translation.Hi, I'm Zini! Software developer ready t: Hi, I'm Zini! Software developer ready to work with:
translation.Here you can find some of the projects t: Here you can find some of the projects that I've developed so far.
translation.Keep in touch to see newer ones as I dev: Keep in touch to see newer ones as I develop more!
translation.This is an app that shows meals and drin: This is an app that shows meals and drinks recipes, allow the user to keep track of the steps and ingredients, and also to favorite, filter and search for recipes. It was made with React and ContextAPI to manage the state, and followed a mobile-first approach.
translation.Fully responsive app that allows the use: Fully responsive app that allows the user to search for artists and songs, to save them as favorites and edit their profile in the app.
translation.This is a back-end project that allows t: This is a back-end project that allows the user to create, edit and delete (CRUD) talkers for an event. It was made with Node.js, Express, Docker and MySQL. It follows a layered architecture, with a service layer, a controller layer and a model layer.
translation.Inspired by the Top Trumps games, I deve: Inspired by the Top Trumps games, I developed this one starring drag queens from the reality show 'RuPaul's Drag Race'. It was made with React and class components, to showcase the ability to work with legacy projects.
translation.Simple landing page, made with React, ab: Simple landing page, made with React, about space missions in our solar system. All animations were made using pure CSS, to explore its possibilies.
translation.Hello, my name is João Felipe Zini Hespa: Hello, my name is João Felipe Zini Hespanhol, and I'm passionate about technology. I've always had an affinity for the field, but I grew up in a conservative environment that limited my career options. As a result, I was directed to study Law, just like my father.
translation.My academic journey in law was marked by: My academic journey in law was marked by excellence, allowing me to solve unexplored problems and explore new areas. However, even though I achieved financial stability, Law didn't provide me with a sense of professional fulfillment.
translation.To change this, I planned a transition t: To change this, I planned a transition to my true passion: software development. I acquired technical skills in various technologies, both in Front-end and Back-end, and I'm eager to embark on this new journey with enthusiasm and dedication.
translation.This project consists of the creation of: This project consists of the creation of a Landing Page with Chatbot for the product SP Labs
translation.This project is a simulation of a wallet: This project is a simulation of a wallet, where you can add expenses, convert the spent currencies to Brazilian Real, and view a table with the total expenses. The development was carried out using Redux, React, React Router, and Middlewares for handling asynchronous actions. The tests were developed with React Testing Library.
translation.This is an API developed using Docker, N: This is an API developed using Docker, Node.js, Express and MySQL but the true focus of the project is the testing. It has unit and integration tests, with 100% coverage and quality assured by mutation tests with Stryker.
